attributes.action: To increase child benefit payments to support children during school shut down
attributes.additional_details: So children do not slip into poverty and they do not suffer as a result of the government’s measures to cancel school.
attributes.background: Significantly increase child benefit to meet the extra costs such as heating, water, clothing and food for parents having children at home indefinitely.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300774

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
